mapper.select: SELECT pa.Audit_Type_Id Audit_Type_Id FROM ProjectAudit pa, Dictionary d WHERE pa.Project_Id = '${param1}' AND pa.Audit_Work_Id = '${param2}' AND pa.Audit_Type_Id = d.ID AND d.Type = '${param3}';
mapper.insert: insert into ProjectAudit (ID, Audit_Type_Id, Audit_State, Audit_Work_Id, Audit_Content, Audit_Date, Project_Id) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{auditTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditWorkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
